additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value:
Active ingredients: Homosalate 15% w/w, Octocrylene 6% w/w, Octyl Salicylate 5% w/w, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane 5% w/w

Contains: Alcohol 59.07% v/v

Propellant: Hydrocarbon

additionalProperty.name: Warning
additionalProperty.value:
Warnings: For external use only. Do not use on damaged or broken skin. Avoid contact with eyes. If product gets into eyes rinse thoroughly with water. Discontinue use and see a doctor if signs of irritation or rash appear. Keep out of reach of children. If swallowed seek medical attention immediately. Avoid prolonged sun exposure and wear protective clothing, hats and eyewear. Do not use if you are hypersensitive to any of the ingredients. Intentional misuse by deliberately concentrating and inhaling the contents can be harmful or fatal.

EXTREMELY FLAMMABLE.

description: Neutrogena Beach Defence Sunscreen Spray SPF 50
name: Beach Defence Sunscreen Spray SPF 50
